itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Thereâ€™s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Silver Embroidered Trader's Clothes
item.desc: A noble outfit made for Traders.

item.name: Combat Steel Champron
item.desc: Horse helmet made of steel. Very durable but it is heavy.\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Steel Battle Horseshoe
item.desc: Durable heavy horseshoe made of steel that is purpose built for battle\n- Able to attach on : Horse & Camel & Donkey\nAble to enhance with Black Stone(Armor)

item.name: Krea Dagger of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Krea Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Dagger of Temptation, Krea Dagger

item.name: Krea Dagger of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Krea Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Dagger of Destruction, Krea Dagger

item.name: Krea Dagger of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Krea Dagger.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Dagger of Crimson Flame, Krea Dagger

item.name: Krea Dagger
item.desc: A dagger crafted to meet the strict requirements of adventurers.

item.name: Ultimate Krea Dagger
item.desc: A Krea Dagger developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Krea Dagger of Crimson Flame, Krea Dagger of Destruction, Krea Dagger of Temptation, Krea Dagger
